Hey man, there is already a torrent with the ova in it here :]
Just download it and then choose only to download the ova episodes (63 - 92) :] (http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4618811/Hunter_x_Hunter_TV___all_OVAs) I'm sorry but it'll only take you 1 minute to choose to only download those, I just wasted bandwidth if I upload just the ova :\
Sorry, I shoulda put em together,. I really wish they did dub the ova though, loved this series. Thanks for downloading broseph
